title: 1989 Lilian Cup
text:
The 1989 <a href="Lilian%20Cup">Lilian Cup</a> was the 8th and final season of the competition. The four top placed teams from the <a href="1988%E2%80%9389%20Liga%20Leumit">previous season</a> took part in the competition.
The competition was held in as a straight knock-out competition, with the two top placed teams from the previous season being seeded. The semi-final was played on 11 October 1989 and the final on 28 November. For the first time since the competition began, no 3rd-place match was played.
The competition was won by <a href="Hapoel%20Petah%20Tikva%20F.C.">Hapoel Petah Tikva</a>, who defeated <a href="Beitar%20Tel%20Aviv%20F.C.">Beitar Tel Aviv</a> 4–2 in the final.
